channel.title: [562] really need help must read!
channel.description:
hay guys.. i got a runeslay 562 base server and when i drop an item it disapears.. i really wanna know how i can fix it and yes i tryd searching it too
and 1 more question what do u think i should make my home be??lol edge varrock fally lummy yanile etc.
tyvm well rank and thanks for whoever helps :D

item.title: [562] really need help must read!
item.dc:creator: @moe230 moe230
item.description:
@moe230 wrote:

public void createDropGroundItem(Player player, Location location, Item item) { for (FloorItem fi : items) { if (fi.getPlayer() == player && !fi.isDestroyed() && !fi.isSpawn() && fi.getLocation().equals(location) && fi.getId() == item.getId()) { fi.incrementAmount(item.getAmount()); fi.resetDroppedAt(); refresh(fi); return; } }

plzzplzplzplz help

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

post ur public void createDropGroundItem in util/itemmanager.java or a drop code… search drop in the src…

and for the home, search a nice place in ur list based on the server name or what ever…

item.title: [562] really need help must read!
item.dc:creator: @ladesman ladesman
item.description:
@ladesman wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:5, topic:364456”][quote author=ladesman link=topic=460672.msg3370271#msg3370271 date=1287181538]

Edgeville is overused
Varrock is just a terrible home
Falador is an okay home.
Lumbridge is a bad home.
Yanille is home on a lot of 562s.

So I guess the winner is Falador
Doesn’t that server um whatever-it’s-called have that as a home?

So I guess you should put down some more ideas as a home.

Maybe Ape Atoll? Just a suggestion.
Or crash island?

no acually use shilo village
[/quote]

That’s weird Shilo is starting to get popular. I made it my home before it was popular :D[/quote]
same haha its my home on my 525

Read full topic
